Name: Occult Rewrite
About the game: - Gameplay Features - Â  Earn your good ending! Thinking you can enter-key your way to victory? Think again! Occult Rewrite counts with an investigation style gameplay where you'll have to examine clues, gather evidence, talk to your classmates and discuss the situation in order to reach the truth! Death is not the end! Every story can be rewritten! Give in to the sweet allure of mystery! To solve the island mystery you'll have to face deadly situations. Even failure Has its merits! Every ending holds an important clue! It's not Erotic Horror without Horror Tactical Pants-shitting action! (With no jump scares, sudden hand movements can be dangerous.) A scenario for every taste. Yes, even for you, the weirdo at the back! - Story Summary -
